price: A quien Dios extravía nadie lo podrá guiar. A éstos Dios los deja que actúen desorientados en su ceguera.
arabic: مَن يُضۡلِلِ ٱللَّهُ فَلَا هَادِيَ لَهُۥۚ وَيَذَرُهُمۡ فِي طُغۡيَٰنِهِمۡ يَعۡمَهُونَ

version.title: Spanish Translation - Isa Garcia
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish by Muhammad Isa Garcia - Printed in 1433 H.

meta.transliteration: man yuḍ'lili al-lahu falā hādiya lahu wayadharuhum fī ṭugh'yānihim yaʿmahūna
